message: Abbreviation in name 'technologyRecommendationDAO' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
Abbreviation in name 'recommendationsUpTO' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'recommendationTO' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
At-clause should have a non-empty description.
